price: Ingere y’ikibi, ni ikibi ku kindi, uwukoze ikibi akagihanirwa ku rugezo rw’ingere ku yindi; uwubabariye uwamukoreye ikibi na we akareka kwihora, maze nya kibi akakiguza ingere y’iciza ku bw’Imana Allah, uyo rero indishi yiwe ayizeye ku Mana Allah. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, ntikunda namba abarenganya mu gusomborotsa abandi.
arabic: وَجَزَٰٓؤُاْ سَيِّئَةٖ سَيِّئَةٞ مِّثۡلُهَاۖ فَمَنۡ عَفَا وَأَصۡلَحَ فَأَجۡرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

meta.transliteration: wajazāu sayyi-atin sayyi-atun mith'luhā faman ʿafā wa-aṣlaḥa fa-ajruhu ʿalā al-lahi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
